channel.title: Should I Play HL1 First?
channel.description: Okay so I'm really looking forward to Black Mesa, but I haven't played HL1 properly. Sooo do you think I should play it first or wait for BM? Because I was wondering that because BM is such a drastic change from the original that I would apreciate it more if I played HL1 first. Or should I not bother and just take BM in all it's greatness?

It’s one of the many games I’ve been a part of a testing team for

Play HL Source you must learn how to play HL 1 first you must to recognize remade levels of Black Mesa who are similar with the originals of HL 1

item.title: Should I Play HL1 First?
item.dc:creator: cloak
item.description:
Here’s the thing… i have roughly the same game plan as Firetime up there… but (although i love the original HL) its been several years (like 8 maybe) since i’ve beaten it. Naturally over that time (even though i’ve beat it like 10 times) I will have forgotten some of it and I’m worried that if i play though it again now before BM comes out… that when it does (even though it will be remarkable) it might get boring because more or less i just played the whole story. Soo… I was gonna play it like this…
Decay => BS => Opp Force => BM => HL2 => Ep1 => Ep2
thoughts?..

Read full topic

item.title: Should I Play HL1 First?
item.dc:creator: Deutscher_Scharfschu
item.description:
Armchair:

I was playing Half-life, eager to finish in wonderful preparation of BM:S. Sadly my computer decided to perform a mass genocide and delete some saved game information, including my Half-life save. I’m too lazy to replay those levels, so I just decided to wait for Black Mesa. So pick whichever choice makes your heart happy, or something.

You could always Google game saves.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I Play HL1 First?
item.dc:creator: metroid_maniac
item.description:
I would play Half Life first. I found Half Life on eBay for a pound sterling and when I registered it on Steam it came with all the expansions. Best pound spent EVER

Read full topic

item.title: Should I Play HL1 First?
item.dc:creator: LimitBreak
item.description:
If you play Half-Life first, then you will get used to first-person shooter controls if you’re not experienced with such games. It will make Black Mesa essentially easier, and you will understand how the original game is in comparison to the remake. The game itself is a masterpiece, for the turn of the century.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I Play HL1 First?
item.dc:creator: Grey_Acumen
item.description:
I know I’ve said it before, but I’ll say it again.

HL1 gets you access to all the various HL1 mods that have been made. So not only will it give you a fair comparison to judge Black Mesa from, but it will also give you access to a ridiculous number of high quality mods that you would never have access to if you went with HL: S or Black Mesa only.

Read full topic

item.title: Should I Play HL1 First?
item.dc:creator: Shadi
item.description:
Half-life alongside Warcraft were the very first PC games I ever played back in 90s and will always remain my all time favorite

Read full topic
